info.title: PSU Research Metadata API
info.description: An API that serves as the authority on faculty and research data at Penn State University in the swagger-2.0 specification.

get.description: Returns grant data associated with a publication

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of publication to retrieve grants

agency.description: The name of the organization that awarded the grant

abstract.description: A description of the grant's purpose

amount_in_dollars.description: The monetary amount of the grant in U.S. dollars

start_date.description: The date on which the grant begins

end_date.description: The date on which the grant ends

identifier.description: A code identifying the grant that is unique to the awarding agency

get.description: Returns a single publication if the user has access

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of publication to fetch

get.description: Returns all publications from the system that the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number publications to return

get.description: Returns organization memberships for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve organization memberships

organization_name.description: The name of the organization to which the user belongs

position_title.description: The user's role or title within the organization

position_started_on.description: The date on which the user joined the organization in this role

position_ended_on.description: The date on which the user left the organization in this role

get.summary: Retrieve a user's news feed items
get.description: Returns a news feed items for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve news feed items

title.description: The title of the news feed item

url.description: The URL where the full news story content can be found

description.example: A news story about a Penn State researcher
description.description: A brief description of the news story content

published_on.description: The date on which the news story was published

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve presentations

activity_insight_identifier.description: The unique identifier for the presentation's corresponding record in the Activity Insight database

organization.description: The name of the organization associated with the presentation

location.description: The name of the location where the presentation took place

started_on.description: The date on which the presentation started

ended_on.description: The date on which the presentation ended

meet_type.description: The meet type of the presentation

attendance.description: The number of people who attended the presentation

refereed.description: Whether or not the presentation was refereed

abstract.example: A presentation about Penn State academic research
abstract.description: A summary of the presentation content

comment.example: The goal of this presentation was to broaden public awareness of a research topic.
comment.description: Miscellaneous comments and notes about the presentation

scope.description: The scope of the audience for the presentation

profile_preferences.description: An array of settings for each user who is an author of the publication indicating how they prefer to have the publication displayed in a profile

user_id.description: The ID of the user to which this set of preferences belongs

webaccess_id.description: The WebAccess ID of the user to which this set of preferences belongs

visible_in_profile.description: The user's preference for whether or not this publication should be displayed in their profile

position_in_profile.description: The user's preference for what position this publication should occupy in a list of their publications in their profile

get.description: Returns grant data for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve grants

agency.description: The name of the organization that awarded the grant

abstract.description: A description of the grant's purpose

amount_in_dollars.description: The monetary amount of the grant in U.S. dollars

start_date.description: The date on which the grant begins

end_date.description: The date on which the grant ends

identifier.description: A code identifying the grant that is unique to the awarding agency

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve performancess

activity_insight_id.description: The unique identifier for the performances's corresponding record in the Activity Insight database

sponsor.description: The the organization that is sponsoring this performance

description.example: This is a unique performance, performed for specific reasons
description.description: Any further detail describing the performance

group_name.description: The name of the performing group

location.description: Country, State, City, theatre, etc. that the performance took place

start_on.description: The date that the performance started on

end_on.description: The date that the performance ended on

first_name.description: The first name of a contributor

last_name.description: The last name of a contributor

contribution.description: The contributors role/contribution to the performance

name.description: Name of the venue for the screening

location.description: Country, State, City, that the screening took place

profile_preferences.description: An array of settings for each user who is an author of the publication indicating how they prefer to have the publication displayed in a profile

user_id.description: The ID of the user to which this set of preferences belongs

webaccess_id.description: The WebAccess ID of the user to which this set of preferences belongs

visible_in_profile.description: The user's preference for whether or not this publication should be displayed in their profile

position_in_profile.description: The user's preference for what position this publication should occupy in a list of their publications in their profile

get.summary: Retrieve a user's student advising history
get.description: Returns ETDs for which the user served on the committee

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve ETDs

year.description: The year in which the ETD was completed

author_last_name.description: The last name of the ETD's author

author_first_name.description: The first name of the ETD's author

author_middle_name.description: The first name of the ETD's author

get.description: Returns a publications for a user

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve publications

parameters.name: start_year
parameters.description: Beginning of publication year range

parameters.name: end_year
parameters.description: End of publication year range

parameters.name: order_first_by
parameters.description: Orders publications returned

parameters.name: order_second_by
parameters.description: Orders publications returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number publications to return for the user

get.description: Returns a representation of a user's profile information

parameters.name: webaccess_id
parameters.description: Webaccess ID of user to retrieve HTML profile

name.description: The full name of the user

organization_name.description: The name of the user's primary organization

title.description: The title of the user's position

office_location.description: The room number and building where the user's office is located

office_phone_number.description: The telephone number for the user's office

personal_website.description: The domain or URL for the user's personal website

total_scopus_citations.description: The total number of times that all of the user's publications have been cited as recorded in Scopus (Pure)

scopus_h_index.description: The user's H-Index value in Scopus (Pure)

pure_profile_url.description: The URL for the user's profile page on the Penn State Pure website

orcid_identifier.description: The URL for the user's ORCID ID

bio.example: Some biographical information about this user
bio.description: A brief biography of the user

teaching_interests.description: A description of the user's teaching interests

research_interests.description: A description of the user's research interests

items.description: A string of HTML describing a journal article
A description of an awarded grant

items.example: My Presentation, Penn State University, University Park
My Performance, Eisenhower Auditorium - Penn State University, 3/1/2016
Graduate Student Master Thesis Example (Committee Member)
items.description: A description of a graduate student master thesis advising role with an HTML link to the thesis

items.example: Graduate Student PhD Dissertation Example (Committee Member)
items.description: A description of a graduate student PhD dissertation advising role with an HTML link to the dissertation
A description of a news story with an HTML link to the story content

items.example: BS, Biology - The Pennsylvania State University - 2010
items.description: A description of a degree earned by the user

post.summary: Retrieve publications for a group of users
post.description: Returns publications for a group of users

parameters.name: start_year
parameters.description: Beginning of publication year range

parameters.name: end_year
parameters.description: End of publication year range

parameters.name: order_first_by
parameters.description: Orders publications returned

parameters.name: order_second_by
parameters.description: Orders publications returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number publications to return for each user
Webaccess IDs of users to retrieve publications
parameters.name: webaccess_ids

get.description: Returns all visible organizations to which the given API token has access.
Returns publications that were authored by users while they were members of the organization

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an organization

journal_title.description: The title of the journal in which the publication was published

volume.description: The volume of the journal in which the publication was published

issue.description: The issue of the journal in which the publication was published

edition.description: the edition of the journal in which the publication was published

page_range.description: The range of page numbers on which the publication content appears in the journal

authors_et_al.description: Whether or not the publication has additional, unlisted authors

abstract.description: A brief summary of the content of the publication

doi.description: The Digital Object Identifier URL for the publication

published_on.description: The date on which the publication was published

citation_count.description: The number of times that the publication has been cited in other works

first_name.description: The first name of a person who contributed to the publication

middle_name.description: The middle name of a person who contributed to the publication

last_name.description: The last name of a person who contributed to the publication

pure_ids.description: Unique identifiers for corresponding records in the Pure database that represent the publication

activity_insight_ids.description: Unique identifiers for corresponding records in the Activity Insight database that represent the publication

profile_preferences.description: An array of settings for each user who is an author of the publication indicating how they prefer to have the publication displayed in a profile

user_id.description: The ID of the user to which this set of preferences belongs

webaccess_id.description: The WebAccess ID of the user to which this set of preferences belongs

visible_in_profile.description: The user's preference for whether or not this publication should be displayed in their profile

position_in_profile.description: The user's preference for what position this publication should occupy in a list of their publications in their profile
